name: pesto potato
description: This pesto potato recipe is a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar marvel, perfect for those following a health-conscious diet. It turns humble ingredients into a delicious side dish that pairs well with a variety of mains. Ideal for those seeking healthy recipes to enrich their culinary repertoire.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Garlic Marble Potatoes under cold water until clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the potatoes in a pot of salted water until they are fork-tender, about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the potatoes and let them cool slightly. Once cool enough to handle, cut them in half.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, gently toss the halved potatoes with the All Purpose Pesto until evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the potatoes warm as a delightful side dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
